Description: Job description1. Develop & execute various marketing strategies to achieve sales plan in line with the overall company strategy in GCC.2. Maximize off take on company brands through various trade marketing initiatives.3. Develop and launch integrated, multi-channel print, catalogue, digital and direct marketing campaigns to aid in business growth.4. Plan and execute media buying in line with overall plan developed for GCC region.5. Play a key role in helping the launch of NPD's thereby helping to increase the market share of the respective brands.6. Execute targeted market visits to increase sales & to ensure effective shelf space allocation & promotional activity.Skills
Skills:
Strong project management, multitasking, and decision-making skills.
Prior exposure to the field of marketing as a manager or executive.
Proficient in using techniques like descriptive analysis along with knowledge of email, social media, display advertising, and other forms of marketing.
Established record of marketing products or services in a professional setup.
